评论详情: i love the pants, they fit well  and looked great on me the material was pretty rough but that was expected for jeans oviously anyways i recommend them
Fits great! Love how they look on me and they came quick and on time. Very accurate to the pictures! Should still be comfortable if you size down a bit too.

评论概述: size down and smells even after multiple washes
评论详情: These looked so much in the photo like pants I loved when i was a teenager, so when they came i was sad to find they were pretty big for the size i ordered. But I figured hey wash them and wear a belt right?  i' have washed these pants 6 times and not even a tiny bit of shrinkage. Then there was and still is the smell! They smell like straight cat pee. I have washed them with everything I can think of to get rid of that smell but they are just as potent as they came. so I've basically stopped wearing them until i can figure out how to get rid of the god-awful smell. they are very long but otherwise pretty cute, but the smell is a deal breaker for me.
My daughter looooves this denim! I misjudged the size but she doesn't want to change. Great buy!

评论概述: Great material, should’ve ordered my normal size.
评论详情: I’d normally say some company’s make their pants smaller or bigger than they’re supposed to be but this one doesn’t, I ordered a large(I'm a medium) and it came a bit bigger. Should’ve ordered a med but that’s on me XD. Otherwise I have nothing else to say about these than their great, if you’re looking for a cute pair of jeans these are the ones. ORDER YOUR NORMAL SIZE!!!
Baggy, and comfortable

评论概述: Looks good and held up in the wash
评论详情: As advertised. Did wash it separately and didn’t use the dryer the first time. Have been putting in the dryer since then and it’s been fine.
I tried it on and it was way too big on my things and just doesn’t look cute at all
cute and it fits so well!!!!

The fabric isn’t super soft. I wear a size medium/size 6 usually, and these run a little big. They aren’t low waisted at all and they definitely aren’t baggy like in the product pics. However, the slight stretch is great and the denim finish is cool.

These absolutely ate, I loved them so much they fit nice on me and I usually look ugly in clothes I'm extremely insecure and these are the first pants I think actually looks good on me. Very flattering. My only complaint  is they look odd on the bottom but I think thats just my opinion.

love these so much!! they're super cute, comfy [a little tight around the waist but i dont mind!], and surprisingly well made! they're super flattering, and the material is thicker than i expected, but still thin enough to be breathable and not suffocating. they stretch to a certain extent, but are firm after that, which i like. doesn't feel like they're gonna fall apart or tear a seam right up my butt, lol
My daughter loves these jeans
Kiddo loves these. Fairly true to size. Good material.

I really like these. A bit short in the legs (I wanted them to touch the ground but they do not, plus the leg length shrunk more after washing) and the thread on the waist band is a little scratchy, but they are still really cute and comfortable. If they were a little longer they would remind me of high school. :) Im not sure why pants are being made shorter when humans on average are getting taller…

It’s very cute, it’s a bit stretchy which is nice, and pretty deep pockets. Quality feels nice.  It’s kind of flattering on me and kinda looks like the picture.. it’s just not as baggy as it looks at the picture.
Even in a small the pants were still very large and unflattering.

The first thing I noticed when I opened the packaging was the terrible chemical smell.  The next thing was the very rough, coarse fabric.  I tried to wash these jeans to see if it would get any better but it didn't at all.  Will be returning.
they are so cute, so flattering, and are now some of my most worn pants
My grand girl loved them!
I loved it, but the pants were too long for me🥲
too short
Good material but had a funky smell that was hard to wash out
It wasn’t at all what I wanted
The legs on these are really wide but they're comfortable and fit as expected.  They remind me of elephant pants or something from the 80's-early 90's.
These jeans fit like a dream! The skinny cut hugs my curves in all the right places. The sizing is spot-on, providing a comfortable and flattering fit.
